p: The response of governments worldwide to COVID-19 has been virology-based, disregarding toxicological issues. That response consisted of: (1) imposing a quarantine on the public (residents, travelers) that will restrict exposure to only one constituent of the virus-toxic stressors combination nexus (SARS-CoV-2) that may be triggering the toxic stressors combination-enabled chain of events leading to COVID-19; (2) conducting searches for, and trials of, mainly repurposed anti-viral treatments; and (3) accelerating SARS-CoV-2 vaccine development. The following example highlights the very limited nature of, and flaws inherent in, this virology-centric approach.
